abstain.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to choose not to vote for or against something
abstain.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Six countries voted for the change, five voted against, and two abstained.
abstain.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to not do or have something you enjoy, especially alcohol or sex, usually for reasons of religion or health
abstain.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Pilots must abstain from alcohol for 24 hours before flying.
